name: Dark Cloud 2
description:
Experience Dark Cloud™ 2 for PS2™ system with 1080p up-rendering and Trophies. Additional enhanced features include Shareplay, Remote Play, Activity Feeds and Second Screen support for game manuals with PS Vita or PS App.
Build your world. INVENT your weapons. CREATE your adventure!
Discover a secret binding the past, present and future. A secret where an innocent inventor, a temporal warrior and an ageless evil hold the key.
• Experience an epic action/role-playing adventure that relies on your innovation as much as exploration and fighting reflexes.
• Enhanced Georama allows you to re-create worlds with more freedom & flexibility.
• Tinker with the Invention System allowing you to create hundreds of items including tools, weapons and more.
• Fight your way through an array of unexplored dungeons including caves, sewers and forests.
• Over 100 hours of action-RPG gameplay filled with hundreds of Items, numerous levels, and a wide array of monsters.

Consequently, there may be times where the title plays differently from the PlayStation®2 version, or where some features may not function properly.
